price: 38. Woh ku -ina yaysixxigeenim tet niysixxigeeh woh sorkocobaxal teetik Qidne waqdi.
arabic: إِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh awḥaynā ilā ummika mā yūḥā
